RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUNNER GABRIEL stalked three wide, pressed the top pair from the four path around the turn, bid nearing the lane, dueled with an inner ROMANIAN PRINCE through the lane while being bumped multiple times and floated outwardly by that one, yet prevailed. ROMANIAN PRINCE bumped with an inner rival at the start before brushing with an outer foe in the aftermath, bumped his inner counterpart once more shortly after before being hustled forward between horses, prompted the leader along with an outer rival into the turn, bid turning for home, dueled with his outer counterpart in upper stretch but leaned out and bumped that one multiple times in the final furlong and got bested. ONE STEP ASIDE broke a step slow, trailed in the three to five path and moved up. ATLAS FALLS broke a step slow, saved ground well back and improved inside of foes. A VAN ON THE RUN brushed with an inner rival at the start and failed to factor from the three path. AFFAIR TO REMEMBER chased along the inside, shifted out entering the lane and faded. NOAH MY BABY bumped with an outer rival twice at the start, set the pace in the two path, showed the way from outer pressers into the turn but weakened with a quarter mile to go.

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, trailed, 3p turn, 5p3/16, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Affair to Remember
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, 3p3/16, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Noah My Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumps start, speed 2p, ins pair turn, wknd 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Romanian Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmps st,hustled btw,prompt 2wbtw,bid,duel ins,lean out/bmps,bestd

ENTRY.NAME: A Van On the Run
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed start, off pace 3p, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Atlas Falls
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodgers Larry R Leedy Linda and Bonomo Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, far back ins, saved ground, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Gunner Gabriel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, pressed 4p turn, bid 1/4, dueled, bumped, prevailed

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Daniel J. Yates & Patricia J. Yates

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 19. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRSTHAND JUSTICE stalked four to three wide while urging along outside of rivals into the turn, progressed to bid turning for home, drifted to the five path entering the lane and drove clear. KARAMEL CORN laid off of the pace in the four path, shifted out to the six path in midstretch and rallied for place. TIDE RISING tracked along the inside, came under urging into the turn, was green to advance inside of rivals through a rail seam at the furlong grounds, yet did so and edged show. JACK BE FAST dueled two wide, then between horses tipping to the three path entering the lane, but was bested by his outer counterpart before yielding between horses late. RED HOT POWER chased in the three path, but gave way between horses around the turn, yet kept on mildly. OL' L B broke a step slow, rushed forward to duel for the lead inside of a rival, but chased an outer pair into the lane and weakened between horses in the final furlong. JOES A ROCKIN was outrun and pulled up in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' L B
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start,rushed,dueled ins,ins pair 1/4,wknd btwn 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2wd, btwn 1/4, 3p3/16, bested, yielded btwn late

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside,urged turn,slipped through greenly 1/8,edged show

ENTRY.NAME: Joes a Rockin
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun, pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Firsthand Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked/urged 4-3wd, bid 1/4, 5p3/16, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Karamel Corn
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 6p1/8, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3p, gave way btwn turn, kept on mildly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ESTILO FAVORITO bumped with an inner rival at the start, vied outside of a foe into the turn, drew clear in the three path with three furlongs to go and maintained a wide margin under a drive. NATURE OFTHE BEAST bumped with an outer rival at the start, chased in the two path and ran on to gain place from an outer foe in the final furlong. STREET MAX leaned in and was off a step slow, raced off of the pace three wide, improved between horses entering upper stretch, shifted inwardly at the furlong grounds and stayed on. ARCHARCH CAT bumped with an outer rival upon leaving the gates, stalked in the four path, gained place and took aim on the clear leader turning for home, but only managed to chase that one through upper stretch before giving way. DOMI broke a step slow and failed to threaten from the five path. MINDSHIP Q lacked speed along the inside and failed to factor. MAS ORO vied for the lead inside of the eventual winner into the turn, but weakened with three furlongs to go. CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS bumped an inner rival at the start, raced at the rear two wide and between horses and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Mindship Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Nature Ofthe Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, chased 2p, ran on, up place 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Cantrunwithbigdogs
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, at rear 2wd btwn, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Mas Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied ins winner, gave way 3/8, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Street Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: lean in/step slow st,off pace 3wd,improved btw upr,shftd in,stayd

ENTRY.NAME: Archarch Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, stalked 4p, took aim 5/16, chased, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Favorito
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, vied 2wd, drew clear 3p3/8, driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sherry R. Mansfield & Kenneth H. Davis

ENTRY.NAME: Domi
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, off pace 5p, no menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 25900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 19 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Wei ght Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CROSSED UP prompted outside of the leader and from the three path, dueled with that one through the lane, wrestled an advantage late and held from an outer bidder. HIGH FIRE trailed in the five path, rallied to attempt a late bid outside of the new leader approaching the wire, but ran out of ground. DIVA POWER set the pace inside the two path as the eventual winner applied outside pressure, dueled with that one through midstretch but gave in late. NO TWOWAYSABOUTIT stalked in the four path and only managed to chase through the lane. TWERK tracked in the four to three path and failed to menace. APPEALING SENORITA saved ground off of the pace and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: High Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Boots N Bikinis LLC and Jones Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 5p, rallied, late bid, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, saved ground, faded

ENTRY.NAME: No Twowaysaboutit
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 4p, chased, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2p, dueled ins winner, gave in late

ENTRY.NAME: Twerk
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4-3p, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Crossed Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 2wd-3p, dueled, led late, held

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Bolyard Investments, LLC & TC Stable LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 19. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACCURATE tracked in the two path, sustained a grinding charge to bid inside of the leader in the final furlong, forged an advantage as that one drifted out entering the final sixteenth, then shifted outwardly and edged clear. MUCHO PRIMO vied in the three path, led around the turn, drifted outwardly entering the final furlong, straightened before drifting again entering the final sixteenth allowing for an inner rival to gain an advantage, then got bested and herded by that one in the closing stages. THE MAN CAN vied along the inside, chased the leader around the turn, then kept on well. BUCKEYE RUCKUS pursued from midpack in the five path and chased willingly. TIZ A RUSH was away awkwardly and last of all, trailed in the four path, floated out to the seven path entering the lane and moved up. PLATE IT UP laid off of the pace in the three path, shfited out tot he six path nearing the lane and failed to factor. BLUE MONARCH lacked speed along the inside and was outrun. JUST CHESTER pressed in the four path, chased in upper stretch and weakened through the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz a Rush
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward/slow start, trailed 4p, 7p3/16, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Monarch
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Accurate
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins,2p turn,bid btw 1/8,up 1/16,shifted out,edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: The Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, chased turn, kept on well

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p, 6p/16, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Mucho Primo
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w-3p,led turn,drft out1/8,headed/drft out1/16,bested,herded

ENTRY.NAME: Just Chester
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3w-4p, chased upper, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 5p, chased willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 19 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowance s) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SICILIAN STYLE TWO stalked three wide, was roused into the turn to bid along with an outer foe turning for home, dueled between horses through midstretch and narrowly prevailed. WANDA SUSIE DOOZY tracked forwardly two wide and between horses, split foes to bid inside of the leader at the furlong grounds, dueled through the late stages but just missed. CATCHAFALLNSTAR was antsy in the starting gate, then broke slowly, trailed in the two to three path, swung out to the seven path entering the lane, rallied with a late kick in hopes of reeling in the top pair, but ran out of ground. SHE HAD A SECRET laid off of the pace in the five path and chased willingly. MY DANCING QUEEN tracked in the four path, bid turning for home, vied through midstretch but yielded entering the final sixteenth. SILVER CANDICE was a bit restless in the starting gate, set the pace along the inside, was headed by a pair of bidders nearing the lane, then kept on before weakening leaving the sixteenth pole. THEODOROPOULOS chased along the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Theodoropoulos
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Candice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit restless gate, set pace ins, headed ins pair 1/4, wknd 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Catchafallnstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate,off slow,trailed 2-3p,7p upr,rallied,late bid,missed

ENTRY.NAME: She Had a Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 5p, chased willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Wanda Susie Doozy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward 2wd btwn, bid btwn 1/8, dueled inside, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Sicilian Style Two
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd, roused, bid btwn 5/16, dueled, narrowly prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: My Dancing Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and BB Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4p, bid 1/4, vied, yielded 1/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 26400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 19 All owed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAY ROYALITY bumped an inner rival soon after the start, prompted along the inside, bid two wide and between horses approaching the far turn, vied through midstretch, inched clear at the sixteenth pole and held from an outer bidder. SHE'S CRAFTY trailed in the four path, advanced in the five path around the far turn, then sustained a rally to gain place in the final sixteenth but was too late to reel in the leader. LIBERTY BELLE set the pace in the three path before tucking to the inside entering the backstretch, vied with an outer pair of bidders around the far turn, but gave way with a sixteenth to go. LOST BIKINI took simultaneous bumps from rivals on both sides soon after the start, tracked in the three path, bid three wide into the far turn, vied turning for home, but yielded leaving the furlong grounds. LIAM'S LASS pursued from midpack in the four to three path, chased around the far turn and failed to menace. JEN'S BATTLE lacked speed in the five to four path and faded. QUARANTINA bumped an outer rival in the opening stages, pursued from midpack along the inside but was done early and jogged home.

ENTRY.NAME: She's Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed 4p, gained 5p2nd, rallied, up place late, gaining

ENTRY.NAME: Quarantina
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump early, midpack inside, done early, jogged home

ENTRY.NAME: Lost Bikini
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btwn after start, tracked 3p, bid 3w2nd, vied, yielded 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Royality
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump early, prompt ins, bid 2wd btwn 2nd, cleared 1/16, held

ENTRY.NAME: Liam's Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 4p, chased 3p2nd, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Liberty Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3p, ins 5/8, ins pair 2nd, yielded 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Jen's Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 5-4p, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ITSABLINGTHING vied in the three path and between horses into the turn, led from an outer pair while drifting to the four path nearing the lane and drove clear. TRICKED OUT broke a step slow, tracked in the three path, took aim inside of the clearing leader in upper stretch and chased that one home to prove second best. FAITHFUL STEPS was bumped and steadied back at the start, trailed along the inside and moved up. SISTER CODE tracked from midpack in the five path, bid outside of the top pair while floating to the six path turning for home and gave way. LOVE MY CANDY prompted from the four path, vied between horses getting floated to the five path turning for home and weakened. LINDSY'S SHADOW failed to factor from the four path. SKI SLOPE bumped an outer rival at the start, set the pace inside of a pair of vying rivals while a path off of the rail into the turn, but weakened turning for home and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Tricked Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow start, tracked 3p, ins aim upr, chased, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Ski Slope
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, speed ins pair-2p, wknd 5/16, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Faithful Steps
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped/steadied start, trailed inside, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: Itsablingthing
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2w-3p btw, led ins pair 5/16, 4p1/4, drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 3wd-4p, bid btw 5/16, 5p1/4, wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpack 5p, bid 3wd-5p5/16, 6p1/4, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Lindsy's Shadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, no factor
